column5: Roy - awhile back, I believe that you posted a link to a place that made bimini tops for the boats. I was wondering if you knew if they made the complete enclosed covers for a side consule boat. If you still have the link, or anyone else who knows who makes these, I would sure appreciate any info.   Don
These guys make a fantastic product.  http://www.boatcovers.com
Thanks guys - I'll check em' both out.   Don
Roy, is your top made by them?(BIL) I ask because when I had your boat out on the West Arm I was impressed by it's construction.  Gerritt.
